message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the calculation of speed, which is equal to distance divided by time. To calculate the speed, you would need a speedometer, which measures the distance traveled over a certain amount of time. Option (A) is incorrect because a multi-meter measures electrical current, not distance or time. Option (C) is incorrect because a Geiger counter measures radioactivity, not distance or time.
